summary: A college teacher brings the little creatures back to his campus, where they proceed to terrorize the faculty and students.
cast: Evan MacKenzie|Kevin McCarthy|Eva LaRue|John R. Johnston|Patrick Labyorteaux|Billy Morrissette|Hope Marie Carlton|Andrew Barach|Jason Scott Lee|Griffin O'Neal|Marcia Wallace|Stephen Lee|Dan Shor|Sherrie Wills|Patrick Michael Ryan|Thom Adcox-Hernandez|Matthew Lillard|Kathy Benson|Nicole Picard|Sandy Maschmeyer|Bob Bergen|Patrick Pinney|Richard Kind|Kane Hodder|Barbara Anne Klein|Frederick Long
keywords: slapstick|flirtation|bound and gagged|tied to a table|campus
title: Los Ghoulies van a la universidad
